oai_dc:dc.dc:title: INTERGRATING PHYSICAL AND CULTURAL METHODS OF WEED CONTROL – EXAMPLES FROM EUROPEAN RESEARCH
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melander, Scientist Bo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The most recent advances in European research on non-chemical weed control methods and strategies for horticultural and agricultural crops are presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Melander, Scientist Bo (2003) INTERGRATING PHYSICAL AND CULTURAL METHODS OF WEED CONTROL – EXAMPLES FROM EUROPEAN RESEARCH. Paper at: North Central Weed Science Society’s annual meeting, December 2003, Lousville, USA, 1-4 December 2003. [In Press]
